items.title: Sixth night of protests in Turkey as Erdogan hits out at unrest
items.description: Thousands rally against the arrest of opposition politician Ekrem Imamoglu, but his party says their planned protests are coming to an end.

items.title: Japan court dissolves controversial 'Moonies' church
items.description: The Unification Church came under scrutiny after the killing of former PM Shinzo Abe in 2022.

items.title: Rwanda planning to attack Burundi, president tells BBC
items.description: The two countries are on opposite sides in the war in their giant neighbour, DR Congo.

items.title: Bitcoin in the bush - the crypto mine in remote Zambia
items.description: Bitcoin miners will go to remote locations to take advantage of cheap electricity.

items.title: Man swallowed by Seoul sinkhole found dead
items.description: The motorcyclist had fallen into the 20m (65 ft) wide hole that opened up on a Seoul road on Monday evening.
